btp_language_desc: Changes mod language. To take effect, a level restart is required.
btp_compatibility_desc:
Here you can select a compatibility with certain HUD you are using
Applying wrong HUD compatibility may cause your game to crash

[Autodetect: BTP will try to detect installed HUD]
[Any other option: Forces BTP to load compatibility code for that HUD]
btp_steam_avatar_compatibility_desc: If BTP can't load your Steam Avatar and shows '?' sign, enable this option.
btp_show_real_ammo_desc: Shows your ammo count in normal fashion as Magazine/Total Magazine
btp_show_down_counter_desc:
Shows down counter.

For you, the counter starts from max and counts down whenever you get downed.
For teammates, the counter starts from zero and counts up whenever they get downed.
btp_armor_color_desc:
Sets armor color

Rainbow:
100%-75% => Green
75%-50% => Blue
50%-25% => Orange
25%-0% => Red
btp_radial_rip_color_desc:
Sets Ex-President's Radial color

Rainbow:
100%-75% => Green
75%-50% => Blue
50%-25% => Orange
25%-0% => Red
btp_friendly_panel_desc: Sets every panel to friendly name and avatar (except you)
btp_sydneyhud_stamina_bar_position_1: Use Steam/Heister Avatar as Stamina Bar
